info.name: Anime Cursors for All Sites
info.description:
[OtakuStylish.TK] All Sites - Anime Cursors ver1
Enjoy! :3 
Show your gratitude by liking our fanpage 
>> http://www.facebook.com/Th3OtakuPage 
>> http://www.facebook.com/Addicted2Anime 

Instructions on how to apply the cursors
========================================
1. Go to this site http://www.cursors-4u.com/anime
2. Choose your cursor and click its link
3. On the "Cursor Download And Information", you will see a download button. Instead of saving it, copy the cursor URL(For Google: Right click + Copy link address).
4. Paste the URL of the cursor below and click "+ Install with Stylish" and your done :3

Tutorial with image is posted on the site. www.otakustylish.tk

More Themes at www.otakustylish.tk
Cursors by www.cursors-4u.com
info.additionalInfo:
Feb 14, 2013 - Happy Valentine's Day <3
Feb 14, 2013 - Official Release
